# Order Harpacticoida {.unnumbered}

Harpacticoids are distinguished by: - very short antennae - wider urosome relative to other orders - short, splayed caudal rami

![](harpacticoid/harpacticoid.png)

All taxa of Harpacticoida in the Bay-Delta are identified as Harpacticoid UnID.

There are two known species in CDFW samples: - Tigriopus californicus - Harpacticella spp.
